text: Neuzheli eti nevernyye skazhut: "Mukhammad sam izmyslil Koran i pripisal yego Allakhu"? Otvechay im: "Yesli by ya izmyslil yego, Allakh bez promedleniya nakazal by menya, i vy niskol'ko ne mozhete izbavit' menya ot nakazaniya Allakha. Tol'ko Allakh odin luchshe znayet to, chto vy lozhno rasprostranyayete o Yego ayatakh. Dostatochno Yego Svidetelem v tom, chto ya govoryu pravdu, a vy - lozh'. I tol'ko On - Proshchayushchiy i proshchayet grekh kayushchimsya, obladayet velikoy milost'yu i otsrochivayet nakazaniye greshnikam, chtoby oni raskayalis'
